name: A-MATH
description:
A-MATH

powered by funfuzk

Control this game by use your mouse and keyboard. 

  • Make the right equation bring it to board (start with the center of board). 
  • You can change your tiles by press the change button then select the tiles you want to change. 
  • System will calculate the point for each equation that you submit it to the board. 
  • System display information about amount of remain tiles on the left hand side, you can use it to help you plan your turn. 
  • When you click "end" button system will navigate to display your score scene, in this scene you can navigate to "play again" or "main menu" scene that you want. 

Enjoy this !!! 

See more information https://youtu.be/G5XUYpc8K4Q

If you like this. Pls share, like or subscribe me on youtube channel. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx9l9TCWvbZ5_6tkxTZYJpw 

Thanks for playing.
